media.caption: Advanced kilns, digital inspection systems, and export logistics operate under one roof to deliver consistent quality for landmark projects.
media.imageAlt: Aerial view of Pietra Luxe Hub’s Rafsanjan manufacturing campus

intro.title: Leading the Way to Sustainability Through Innovation
intro.paragraph1: Each collection is mapped for performance, finish, and application so architects and procurement teams can specify faster with confidence.
intro.paragraph2: Our promise: multi-angle imagery, real-project photography, and clear technical packaging data highlight scratch resistance, moisture control, and safety across every format.
intro.heading: Scaling Iranian Craftsmanship for Global Specification

hero.title: Bridging Worlds with Iranian Ceramic & Tile
hero.description: Forged amid sanctions and scarcity, we turned hardship into disciplined innovation. Every batch now blends advanced material science with export-ready engineering for landmark projects across 13 countries.
hero.imageAlt: Panoramic view of Almas Kavir Rafsanjan's manufacturing facility at dusk
hero.lead: We translate the resilience of Iran’s ceramics industry into trusted, globally specified surfaces.
hero.detail: Investments in advanced kilns, digital glazing, and export-focused production lines keep our collections ahead of international standards.

ecocycle.title: EcoCycle: Closed-Loop Water & Material Systems
ecocycle.body: Our EcoCycle program reclaims natural raw materials and filters wastewater before reintroducing it into production. Purpose-built recycling facilities lower our footprint while ensuring each porcelain batch meets export-grade performance.
ecocycle.point1: 100% of treated wastewater is routed back into tile production lines.
ecocycle.point2: Recovered minerals reinforce new bodies without degrading surface quality.
ecocycle.point3: Clean development initiatives reduce carbon output across kiln cycles.
ecocycle.imageAlt: Engineers monitoring the EcoCycle recycling loop in the factory

circular.title: Designing Positive Outcomes for Communities
circular.body: Our sustainability mandate extends past material stewardship. Dedicated safety programs, community investments, and technical training keep local talent at the heart of our expansion.
circular.point1: Comprehensive waste hierarchy that prioritises reuse, recycling, and certified disposal.
circular.point2: Safety-first culture with ISO-aligned audits and site-wide monitoring.
circular.point3: Continuous workforce education to elevate skillsets for premium manufacturing.
circular.imageAlt: Team members reviewing sustainability dashboards on the production floor

commitments.title: Innovation, Impact, Integrity
commitments.description: We design every process — from raw material sourcing to export-ready packaging — to exceed international expectations while protecting the communities and environments we work in.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Manufacturing DNA
sustainability.body: Closed-loop water systems, recycled raw materials, and clean energy initiatives reduce our footprint while certifying every tile for ecological performance.

global.title: Global Partnership Mindset
global.body: We co-create with architects, distributors, and developers, pairing bespoke production runs with logistics expertise to deliver at scale in 13+ markets.

integrity.title: Integrity in Every Batch
integrity.body: ISO 9001, 14001, and 45001 certifications reinforce our promise of reliable product quality, safe operations, and transparent governance.

commitments.heading:
World-Class
Product Portfolio
commitments.body:
At Almas Kavir Rafsanjan, our product categorization is designed for more than convenience—it's about delivering a new, immersive purchasing experience. Each tile is the result of months of market research, rigorous material testing, and direct collaboration with renowned architects and expert users.

  • High-resolution images showing every face and texture, real-life installation photography from luxury and modern projects, exhaustive material descriptions, and full technical packaging details.
  • Every category clearly highlights key features: exceptional scratch and impact resistance, long-lasting color and texture stability even in high-traffic areas, impermeability to moisture, stain resistance, and top safety standards.
  • Each batch undergoes strict QA and is shipped in robust, export-grade packaging to ensure pristine product quality upon delivery—even through the most demanding supply routes. Environmental responsibility and energy efficiency are woven into every phase of production.

kpis.title: Performance Metrics That Power Global Partnerships
kpis.description: We continually measure and report on resource efficiency, community investment, and governance to keep our partners audit-ready.

reuse.label: Material Recovery
reuse.description: Pre-consumer ceramic bodies are recovered, reprocessed, and reintroduced into new product lines.

water.label: Wastewater Treated
water.description: Closed-loop filtration captures, cleans, and recirculates process water across every kiln hall.

production.label: Monthly Capacity
production.description: Flexible lines adjust to bespoke volumes exceeding 100,000 square metres per order.

people.label: Countries Served
people.description: Dedicated export specialists coordinate compliance, translations, and aftercare across global markets.

energy.label: MMBTU Saved
energy.description: Thermal optimisation programs cut gas consumption while stabilising kiln performance.

packaging.label: Recycled Packaging
packaging.description: Export-grade pallets and protection materials are sourced from recycled and recyclable inputs.

governance.title: Responsible Business, Responsible Employer
governance.description: Transparency, safety, and community investment guide every partnership, from material sourcing to long-term aftercare.

ethics.title: Ethics & Compliance
ethics.point3: Dedicated compliance officers for export markets

people.title: People & Wellbeing
people.point3: Inclusive policies across languages and regions

impact.title: Environmental Impact
impact.point3: Supplier engagement to raise shared standards

portfolio.title: A World-Class Product Portfolio
portfolio.body: Every series is born from collaborative research with architects, material scientists, and specification experts. From immersive, multi-angle product imagery to installation galleries and packaging data, we equip professionals with everything they need to build confidently.
portfolio.highlight1: High-definition visuals of each surface, texture, and lay pattern across luxury residential and commercial projects.
portfolio.highlight2: Laboratory-tested performance data covering scratch resistance, stain protection, and climatic durability.
portfolio.highlight3: Export-grade packaging engineered for long-haul supply routes and just-in-time deliveries.

export.title: Export Services: Seamless Pathways to Global Markets
export.body: For us, exporting is more than just shipping tiles—it's a professional partnership for long-term success and the global promotion of Iranian architectural heritage. Our export services cover comprehensive consulting from product selection to installation guidance on-site; professional international transport logistics; complete handling of all legal documentation and global agreements; and end-to-end post-delivery support.
export.highlight1: We offer unmatched flexibility in the customization of dimensions, designs, colors, and packaging tailored to specific market needs—particularly for large-volume orders exceeding 100,000 m², where we adapt production for truly unique projects.
export.highlight2: Competitive pricing is always backed by a quality guarantee, versatile payment options, and ongoing technical support after delivery.
export.highlight3: There are no restrictions—every client, from boutique projects to national distributors, can benefit from our efficient, transparent, and agile export process.

smart.title: Smart Product Combination Module: Tailoring Spaces with Intelligent Choice
smart.body: Our Smart Combination Module is more than a tool—it's a state-of-the-art interactive platform for designers and clients to visualize and experiment with multiple products in any space. Unlike conventional selection tools, our system analyzes buyer behavior patterns and global customer preferences, offering personalized recommendations based on country, trends, and the latest in design.
smart.highlight1: After choosing preferred combinations, users can save or share renderings with architects and project teams. Fully rendered concept files are available for negotiation or detailed planning.
smart.highlight2: This module delivers a modern and enjoyable user experience, acting as your digital advisor for smart, strategic product selection.
smart.highlight3: For specialized combinations or major projects, connect with our technical advisors for expert collaboration and tailored solutions.

certifications.title: Certifications that Validate Our Promise
certifications.description: Internationally recognised standards confirm the reliability, transparency, and sustainability of our manufacturing ecosystem.
certifications.modalDescription: Click outside the frame to close and continue exploring our credentials.
certifications.heading: Regulatory Certifications
certifications.intro: Verified documentation demonstrating Almas Kavir Rafsanjan's compliance with international tile manufacturing and export standards.

iso14001.title: ISO 14001:2015 - Environmental Management System
iso14001.description: This certificate demonstrates that Almas Kavir Rafsanjan has implemented an effective environmental management system. The primary objective of this standard focuses on managing and reducing the harmful impacts of the company's activities on the environment. This means working to prevent pollution, optimize resource consumption (such as water and energy), and comply with environmental laws and regulations.
iso14001.verification: Issued by QMS Italia and its exclusive representative in Iran and the Middle East, QMS Arian Institute. Issue Date: March 26, 2020 | Valid Until: March 25, 2026

iso45001.title: ISO 45001:2018 - Occupational Health & Safety Management
iso45001.description: This certificate confirms that Almas Kavir Rafsanjan complies with international occupational health and safety standards. The objective of this standard is to create a safe and healthy working environment for all employees. This system helps the company identify, assess, and control occupational hazards, and prevent workplace accidents and occupational diseases.
iso45001.verification: Issued by QMS Italia and its representative QMS Arian. Issue Date: March 26, 2020 | Valid Until: March 25, 2026

iso9001.title: ISO 9001:2015 - Quality Management System
iso9001.description: This certificate is one of the most recognized management standards in the world and demonstrates that the company has an effective quality management system. The primary focus of this standard is on customer satisfaction. A company that receives this certificate demonstrates that it has designed its processes so that its products and services (wall tiles, ceramics, and granite) are consistently produced with high quality and in accordance with customer needs.
iso9001.verification: Issued by QMSCERT, an accredited third-party body based in Greece. Issue Date: March 26, 2020 | Valid Until: March 25, 2026

ims.title: IMS - Integrated Management System
ims.description: This certificate is not a separate standard, but rather confirms that Almas Kavir Rafsanjan has implemented the three management systems above—quality (ISO 9001), environmental (ISO 14001), and occupational health and safety (ISO 45001)—in an integrated and coordinated manner. The Integrated Management System (IMS) allows the organization to merge common processes between these three standards. This reduces redundancies, saves time and costs, and increases the overall efficiency of the organization.
ims.verification: Issued by QMS Italia. Issue Date: March 26, 2020 | Valid Until: March 25, 2026

vcp12094.title: VCP12094 Certificate of Conformity
vcp12094.description: OTC Bulgaria Ltd. certifies that Almas Kavir Rafsanjan's dry-pressed ceramic tiles for internal walls and floorings comply with EN 14411:2016 standard. Valid from 07.02.2024 to 06.02.2027. System of Attestation of Conformity 4, according to Regulation 305/2011 Construction Products.

industrialLicense.title: Industrial Production License
industrialLicense.description: Ministry of Industry, Mine & Trade of Iran license for manufacturing ceramic tiles, porcelain, and granite products. Authorizes production and export operations at Almas Kavir Rafsanjan facility located at 10th kilometer of Rafsanjan-Kerman road.

contact.title: Direct Access
contact.body: Email, phone, and live support channels connect you with consultants who understand regional regulations and technical standards.

support.title: Project Aftercare
support.body: We provide maintenance guidance, replacement strategies, and continuous supply reviews to protect your investment.

final.heading: Partner with Pietra Luxe Hub

projectAdvisory.title: Export Consultancy Request
projectAdvisory.body: Engage our experts from planning to project completion. Fill out our export consultancy request form to get started with professional guidance tailored to your needs.

afterSales.title: Partnership Terms & Factory Tour
afterSales.body: Request detailed partnership terms, pricing tables, or schedule a factory tour. Plan an on-site visit for your team or chat live with our export team to discuss technical details, logistics, or custom requirements.

exportServices.heading:
Export Services
Seamless Pathways to Global Markets
exportServices.body:
For us, exporting is more than just shipping tiles—it's a professional partnership for long-term success and the global promotion of Iranian architectural heritage. Our export services cover comprehensive consulting from product selection to installation guidance on-site; professional international transport logistics; complete handling of all legal documentation and global agreements; and end-to-end post-delivery support.

  • Unmatched flexibility in the customization of dimensions, designs, colors, and packaging tailored to specific market needs—particularly for large-volume orders exceeding 100,000 m².
  • Competitive pricing always backed by a quality guarantee, versatile payment options, and ongoing technical support after delivery.
  • No restrictions—every client, from boutique projects to national distributors, can benefit from our efficient, transparent, and agile export process.

smartCombination.heading:
Smart Product Combination Module
Tailoring Spaces with Intelligent Choice
smartCombination.body:
Our Smart Combination Module is more than a tool—it's a state-of-the-art interactive platform for designers and clients to visualize and experiment with multiple products in any space. Unlike conventional selection tools, our system analyzes buyer behavior patterns and global customer preferences, offering personalized recommendations based on country, trends, and the latest in design.

  • After choosing preferred combinations, users can save or share renderings with architects and project teams. Fully rendered concept files are available for negotiation or detailed planning.
  • This module delivers a modern and enjoyable user experience, acting as your digital advisor for smart, strategic product selection.
  • For specialized combinations or major projects, connect with our technical advisors for expert collaboration and tailored solutions.

intro.heading: Intelligent Specification Tools
intro.body: We translate decades of manufacturing excellence into digital experiences that help designers compare surfaces, technical specs, and real-world installations without guesswork.

signatureWhitebody.heading: Signature Whitebody Collections
signatureWhitebody.body:
Premium whitebody cores with luxurious glazes deliver enduring colour depth and clarity for flagship projects.

  • Multiple calibrations across matte, semi-polished, and full-gloss finishes.
  • Real-life installation photography for hospitality, residential, and public spaces.
  • Comprehensive packaging and palletisation data for streamlined logistics.

largeFormat.heading: Large-Format Slabs & Panels
largeFormat.body:
Architects rely on our large-format porcelain for façades, lobbies, and immersive interiors that demand seamless continuity.

  • Advanced kiln technology ensures dimensional stability across oversized formats.
  • Precise thickness control makes installation faster with minimal waste.
  • Project advisory teams assist with anchoring systems and technical drawings.

performance.heading: Performance Surface Innovations
performance.body:
Anti-slip, antibacterial, and high-impact finishes empower designers to balance aesthetics with strict compliance standards.

  • Laboratory-tested glazes maintain hygiene in healthcare and commercial settings.
  • Outdoor-rated textures resist UV fading, frost, and heavy footfall.
  • Technical sheets cover coefficient, resistance, and maintenance guidance.

hospitality.heading: Hospitality & Retail Concepts
hospitality.body:
Curated moodboards combine expressive décors with durable base tiles, helping operators roll out brand experiences faster.

  • Ready-to-use design packs for cafés, resorts, residences, and malls.
  • Coordinated trims, mosaics, and transition pieces for consistent detailing.
  • On-demand sampling with expedited international shipping.

healthcare.heading: Healthcare & Wellness Programs
healthcare.body:
Solutions engineered for hygiene-critical environments without sacrificing warmth or tactility.

  • Slip-resistant, easy-clean surfaces for clinics, spas, and educational campuses.
  • Certified antibacterial glazes that support maintenance protocols.
  • Custom accents and wayfinding inserts to enhance patient experiences.

circular.heading: Circular Manufacturing Loop
circular.body:
Waste minerals and kiln heat are recaptured through recycling systems that close the loop on production resources.

  • Recovered materials are reintegrated into new bodies without degrading surface quality.
  • Water treatment facilities return processed water directly to the line.
  • Energy dashboards monitor kilns to fine-tune efficiency in real time.

climate.heading: Climate-Responsive Efficiency
climate.body:
Smart firing curves, insulation strategies, and logistics planning cut emissions while preserving Italian-inspired craftsmanship.

  • Thermal analytics guide kiln adjustments for maximum output with minimal fuel.
  • Route optimisation reduces transport footprints to our global partners.
  • Transparent reporting keeps clients audit-ready for ESG requirements.

html.rakCeramicsIntro: Our brand's history is rooted in the real challenges faced by Iranian building professionals—with a vision for global quality and authentic innovation. We built teams of experienced engineers, sales experts, designers, and operators, institutionalizing continuous learning and professional development. Active R&D divisions and a culture centered on transparency and ethics earned us long-term client trust both locally and internationally.
html.strategicInitiatives: Our mission: deliver professional, expectation-defying solutions to builders, designers, and industry leaders. Our vision: to rank among the region's leading exporters, establishing the Iranian name at the forefront of global tile and ceramic excellence. Our core values—uncompromising quality, honesty, customer satisfaction, respect, and professional conduct—are lived daily. With 14+ years of experience, distribution across 13 countries, a catalog of over 350 unique models and sizes, and quality certifications from top international authorities, our journey is a testament to the right path in branding.
html.reuseDescription: RE-USE is a porcelain collection made entirely from 100% pre-consumer recycled materials. It keeps premium durability while cutting waste for projects that need sustainability and style.
html.rimlessDescription: RIMLESS TECHNOLOGY removes hidden rims and ledges so bathrooms stay cleaner, quieter, and easier to maintain while using less water per flush.
html.rakProTekDescription: RAK-ProTeK is a permanently baked glaze that creates an ultra-smooth, antibacterial surface for washbasins, toilets, and urinals, reducing stains and cleaning time.
html.rakMaxxFlushDescription: RAK MAXXFLUSH offers adjustable dual-flush control—6L for a full flush, 3L for a half flush, or 4.5L in reduced mode—delivering reliable performance with lower water consumption.
html.rakJoyDescription: RAK JOY pairs refined design with responsibly sourced particleboard and MDF, giving eco-conscious projects durable storage that respects forests and local communities.
html.rakSanitDescription: RAK-SANIT tiles embed silver-based antibacterial agents inside the ceramic body, limiting bacterial growth in kitchens, bathrooms, healthcare facilities, and high-traffic areas.
html.klimaDescription: KLIMA tiles use smart ceramic materials to stay in balance with surrounding temperatures, boosting indoor comfort and lowering heating or cooling demand.
html.findOutMore: FIND OUT MORE ABOUT OUR SUSTAINABILITY APPROACH

faq.label: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.title: Everything You Need to Know
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Almas Kavir Rafsanjan's ceramic tiles, manufacturing processes, certifications, and services.
faq.q1: What certifications does Almas Kavir Rafsanjan have?
faq.a1: We are certified with ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management System), ISO 14001:2015 (Environmental Management System), and ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health and Safety Management System). These certifications ensure our products meet international quality standards.
faq.q2: What tile sizes and types do you manufacture?
faq.a2: We manufacture ceramic tiles, granite tiles, and wall tiles in various dimensions including 30x30, 30x90, 40x40, 40x100, 60x60, 60x120, 80x80, and 100x100 cm. Our product range includes Matt, Polished, and Trans surface finishes.
faq.q3: Do you export your products internationally?
faq.a3: Yes, we export our premium ceramic and granite tiles to 13 countries worldwide. Our export services include comprehensive consulting, international transport logistics, legal documentation handling, and post-delivery support.
faq.q4: Where is your manufacturing facility located?
faq.a4: Our main manufacturing facility is located 10 kilometers from Rafsanjan-Kerman Road in Rafsanjan, Kerman Province, Iran. This strategic location allows us to serve both domestic and international markets efficiently.
faq.q5: How long has Almas Kavir Rafsanjan been in business?
faq.a5: We have been manufacturing premium ceramic and granite tiles for over 14 years. Our extensive experience in the industry has made us a trusted partner for architects, designers, and construction companies worldwide.
faq.q6: What makes your ceramic tiles different from competitors?
faq.a6: Our tiles combine traditional Iranian craftsmanship with modern technology. We use premium materials, maintain strict quality control through ISO certifications, and offer a wide range of designs and sizes. Our environmental management system ensures sustainable production practices.
faq.q7: Can you provide custom tile solutions for large projects?
faq.a7: Yes, we offer customization services for large-volume orders exceeding 100,000 m². We can adapt our production for unique projects, providing custom dimensions, designs, colors, and packaging tailored to specific market needs.
faq.q8: What technical specifications do your tiles meet?
faq.a8: Our tiles meet high technical standards including water absorption < 0.5%, compressive strength > 50 N/mm², abrasion resistance PEI 4-5, and slip resistance R10-R12. All specifications comply with international ceramic tile standards.
faq.q9: How can I request a quote or samples?
faq.a9: You can contact us through our website contact form, email us at info@almasceram.com, or call us directly. We provide detailed quotations, technical catalogs, and can arrange sample delivery for your project evaluation.
faq.q10: Do you offer installation guidance and support?
faq.a10: Yes, we provide comprehensive installation guidance and technical support. Our expert team offers consultation from product selection to installation guidance on-site, ensuring optimal results for your projects.
faq.ctaDescription: Our expert team is here to help you with any questions about our ceramic tiles, technical specifications, or project requirements.
